languages.text: {n}Инскрибия берет в руки свиток с печатями {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}.{/n} "Позвольте зачитать вам решение уважаемых представителей миссии святого Друза. "Тот, кто смел подвергнуть святого сподвижника Анвиласа страшным пыткам, клеймлен нами еретиком и сподвижником всяческого зла". На данный момент душевное состояние кардинала вызывает опасения: он пристрастился к кровавым ритуалам и омерзительным формам самобичевания, а также не единожды ранил прихожан, что пытались дать ему пожертвования".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инскрибия берет в руки свиток с печатями {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}.{/n} "Позвольте зачитать вам решение Собора Церквей Простора. "Тот, кто смел подвергнуть святого сподвижника Анвиласа страшным пыткам, клеймлен нами еретиком и сподвижником всяческого зла". На данный момент душевное состояние Его Преосвященства вызывает опасения: он пристрастился к кровавым ритуалам и омерзительным формам самобичевания, а также не единожды ранил прихожан, что пытались дать ему пожертвования".

languages.text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."
languages.original_text: {n}Инскрибия берет в руки свиток с печатями {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}.{/n} "Позвольте зачитать вам решение уважаемых представителей миссии святого Друза. "Тот, кто смел подвергнуть святого сподвижника Анвиласа страшным пыткам, клеймлен нами еретиком и сподвижником всяческого зла". На данный момент душевное состояние кардинала вызывает опасения: он пристрастился к кровавым ритуалам и омерзительным формам самобичевания, а также не единожды ранил прихожан, что пытались дать ему пожертвования".

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

{n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the Ecclesiarchy's seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the Ecumenical Council of the Expanse. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, His Holiness's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, caused injury to members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

languages.text: {n}Inscribia greift nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g}.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Entscheidung der ehrwürdigen Vertreter der Mission des Heiligen Drusus vorzutragen. 'Wir verurteilen {mf|jenen, der|jene, die} Anvylas, einen heiligen Vertreter des Glaubens, verdächtigt hat zur grausamen Folter als {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin} und {mf|Freund|Freundin} des Bösen.'" Im Moment gibt der geistige Zustand des Kardinals Anlass zur Sorge. Er hat nicht nur eine Vorliebe für blutige Riten und abstoßende Formen der Selbstgeißelung entwickelt, sondern in mehreren Fällen Mitglieder seiner Kongregation verletzt, die versucht hatten, für ihn zu spenden."
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia greift nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g}.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Entscheidung der ehrwürdigen Vertreter der Mission des Heiligen Drusus vorzutragen. 'Wir verurteilen {mf|jenen, der|jene, die} Anvylas, einen heiligen Vertreter des Glaubens, verdächtigt hat zur grausamen Folter als {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin} und {mf|Freund|Freundin} des Bösen.'" Im Moment gibt der geistige Zustand des Kardinals Anlass zur Sorge. Er hat nicht nur eine Vorliebe für blutige Riten und abstoßende Formen der Selbstgeißelung entwickelt, sondern in mehreren Fällen Mitglieder seiner Kongregation verletzt, die versucht hatten, für ihn zu spenden."

{n}Inscribia greift zu einer Schriftrolle mit dem Siegel der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g}.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Entscheidung des Ministerrats der Ausdehnung vorzulesen. 'Wir erklären die Person, die es gewagt hat, Anvylas, heilig und dem Glauben geweiht, grausam zu foltern, zum Ketzer und Komplizen alles Bösen.'" Im Moment gibt der geistige Zustand Seiner Eminenz Anlass zur Sorge. Er hat nicht nur eine Vorliebe für blutige Riten und abstoßende Formen der Selbstkasteiung entwickelt, sondern auch mehrfach Mitglieder seiner Gemeinde verletzt, als diese ihm Spenden übergeben wollten."

languages.text: {n}Inscribia saisit un parchemin qui porte les sceaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}.{/n} « Permettez-moi de lire la décision des honorables représentants de la mission de Saint Drusus. "Nous marquons l'individu ayant osé torturer Anvylas, un disciple respectueux de la foi, comme hérétique et complice des plus grands maux qui soient." La santé mentale du cardinal est inquiétante. Il a non seulement développé un goût pour les rituels sanglants et d'horribles formes d'autoflagellation, mais il a également blessé plusieurs membres de sa congrégation qui essayaient de lui faire des dons. »
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia saisit un parchemin qui porte les sceaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}.{/n} « Permettez-moi de lire la décision des honorables représentants de la mission de Saint Drusus. "Nous marquons l'individu ayant osé torturer Anvylas, un disciple respectueux de la foi, comme hérétique et complice des plus grands maux qui soient." La santé mentale du cardinal est inquiétante. Il a non seulement développé un goût pour les rituels sanglants et d'horribles formes d'autoflagellation, mais il a également blessé plusieurs membres de sa congrégation qui essayaient de lui faire des dons. »

{n}Inscribia saisit un parchemin qui porte les sceaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}.{/n} « Permettez-moi de lire la décision du Conseil ministériel des Étendues. "Nous marquons l'individu ayant osé torturer Anvylas, un disciple respectueux de la foi, comme hérétique et complice des plus grands maux qui soient." La santé mentale de Son Éminence est inquiétante. Il a non seulement développé un goût pour les rituels sanglants et d'horribles formes d'autoflagellation, mais il a également blessé plusieurs membres de sa congrégation qui essayaient de lui faire des dons. »

languages.text: {n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读圣德鲁苏斯教派各位重要代表的一致决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒，我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人受到残酷折磨的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’目前，红衣主教的精神状态令人担忧。他不仅喜欢上了血腥的仪式与令人厌恶的自我鞭笞，还多次伤害那些打算为他捐款的追随者。”
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读圣德鲁苏斯教派各位重要代表的一致决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒，我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人受到残酷折磨的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’目前，红衣主教的精神状态令人担忧。他不仅喜欢上了血腥的仪式与令人厌恶的自我鞭笞，还多次伤害那些打算为他捐款的追随者。”
{n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有国教教会的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读科罗努斯扩区教会议会的决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒，我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人受到残酷折磨的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’目前，主教大人的精神状态令人担忧。他不仅喜欢上了血腥的仪式与令人厌恶的自我鞭笞，还多次伤害那些打算为他捐款的追随者。”

{n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读科罗努斯扩区教长议会的决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒，我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人受到残酷折磨的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’目前，主教大人的精神状态令人担忧。他不仅喜欢上了血腥的仪式与令人厌恶的自我鞭笞，还多次伤害那些打算为他捐款的追随者。”

languages.text: {n}Inscribia toma en su mano un pergamino con los sellos de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}.{/n} «Ahora permítanme leer el fallo de los honorables representantes de la misión de san Drusus. "Declaramos a quien ha osado someter a una horrible tortura a Anvylas, un santo devoto de la fe, hereje y cómplice del mal en todas sus formas". En estos momentos, el estado mental del cardenal es motivo de preocupación. No solo ha desarrollado un gusto por rituales sangrientos y métodos repugnantes de autoflagelación, sino que también, en diversas ocasiones, ha herido a miembros de su congregación que trataban de ofrecerle donaciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia toma en su mano un pergamino con los sellos de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}.{/n} «Ahora permítanme leer el fallo de los honorables representantes de la misión de san Drusus. "Declaramos a quien ha osado someter a una horrible tortura a Anvylas, un santo devoto de la fe, hereje y cómplice del mal en todas sus formas". En estos momentos, el estado mental del cardenal es motivo de preocupación. No solo ha desarrollado un gusto por rituales sangrientos y métodos repugnantes de autoflagelación, sino que también, en diversas ocasiones, ha herido a miembros de su congregación que trataban de ofrecerle donaciones».

{n}Inscribia toma en su mano un pergamino con los sellos de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}.{/n} «Ahora permítanme leer la decisión del Concilio Ministerial de la Extensión. "Declaramos a quien ha osado someter a una horrible tortura a Anvylas, un santo devoto de la fe, hereje y cómplice del mal en todas sus formas". En estos momentos, el estado mental de Su Eminencia es motivo de preocupación. No solo ha desarrollado un gusto por rituales sangrientos y métodos repugnantes de autoflagelación, sino que también, en diversas ocasiones, ha herido a miembros de su congregación que trataban de ofrecerle donaciones».

languages.text: {n}インスクリビアは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}の印章が押された巻物を手に取った。{/n}「聖ドルスス聖務団の名誉ある代表者の方々の決定を読み上げさせていただきます。『信仰の聖なる奉仕者であるアンビラスに恐るべき拷問を加えた者に、異端者かつあらゆる悪の共犯者として烙印を押す』。現在、枢機卿の精神状態は憂慮すべきものです。血なまぐさい儀式や自己に対する不快な形での鞭打ちを好むようになっただけでなく、寄付をしようとした信徒に対しても度々怪我を負わせています」
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}インスクリビアは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}の印章が押された巻物を手に取った。{/n}「聖ドルスス聖務団の名誉ある代表者の方々の決定を読み上げさせていただきます。『信仰の聖なる奉仕者であるアンビラスに恐るべき拷問を加えた者に、異端者かつあらゆる悪の共犯者として烙印を押す』。現在、枢機卿の精神状態は憂慮すべきものです。血なまぐさい儀式や自己に対する不快な形での鞭打ちを好むようになっただけでなく、寄付をしようとした信徒に対しても度々怪我を負わせています」

languages.text: {n}İnscribia, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mühürlerini taşıyan bir tomar alıyor.{/n} "İzin verin, Aziz Drusus misyonu temsilcilerinin kararını okuyayım: 'İnancı uğruna yaşayan kutsal bir müridi, Anvylas'ı, bir şehit misali ölüme göndermeye cüret eden kişi, her tür kötülüğün suç ortağı ve bir sapkın olarak damgalanmıştır.'. Şu an için kardinalin zihinsel durumu ciddi endişe kaynağıdır. Kanlı ayinlere ve iğrenç öz cezalandırma şekillerine karşı belirgin bir eğilim geliştirmiştir; dahası, bağışta bulunmaya çalışan cemaat üyelerini birden fazla kez bizzat yaralamıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to horrible torture a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.' At the moment, the cardinal's mental state is cause for concern. Not only has he developed a fondness for bloody rites and repulsive forms of self-flagellation, but he has also, on several occasions, injured members of his congregation who were trying to make donations to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnscribia, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mühürlerini taşıyan bir tomar alıyor.{/n} "İzin verin, Aziz Drusus misyonu temsilcilerinin kararını okuyayım: 'İnancı uğruna yaşayan kutsal bir müridi, Anvylas'ı, bir şehit misali ölüme göndermeye cüret eden kişi, her tür kötülüğün suç ortağı ve bir sapkın olarak damgalanmıştır.'. Şu an için kardinalin zihinsel durumu ciddi endişe kaynağıdır. Kanlı ayinlere ve iğrenç öz cezalandırma şekillerine karşı belirgin bir eğilim geliştirmiştir; dahası, bağışta bulunmaya çalışan cemaat üyelerini birden fazla kez bizzat yaralamıştır."

{n}İnscribia, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mühürlerini taşıyan bir tomar alıyor.{/n} "İzin verin, Enginlik Bakanlar Meclisi'nin kararını okuyayım: İnancı uğruna yaşayan kutsal bir müridi, Anvylas'ı, bir şehit misali ölüme göndermeye cüret eden kişi, her tür kötülüğün suç ortağı ve bir sapkın olarak damgalanmıştır.'. Şu an için Kardinal'in zihinsel durumu ciddi endişe kaynağıdır. Kanlı ayinlere ve iğrenç öz cezalandırma şekillerine karşı belirgin bir eğilim geliştirmiştir; dahası, bağışta bulunmaya çalışan cemaat üyelerini birden fazla kez bizzat yaralamıştır."
